subject: Dear: Friend,
body:
Dear: Friend,
You might find it so difficult to remember me. Though, it is indeed, a very long time. On my singular, I am very delighted and privileged to contact you again, after a couple of years now. It takes fate, courage and God's fear to remember old friends and at the same time, to show gratitude to them, despite circumstances that made things not work out as we expected then.
I take this liberty to inform you that the transaction I am pursuing , finally worked out by God's infinite mercy and I decided to contact you, just to let you know that I have conscience as a human being, due to your tremendous effort and contribution to make things work out in retrospect.
Meanwhile, I must inform you that I am presently in Luxembourg for numerous business negotiations and establishment. I just arrived yesterday night and checked into a hotel and decided to go down to the hotel business center to mail you. Now, with my sincere heart, I have raised and signed an International Cashier's Bank Draft, to the tune of US$220,000.00 only in your name as COMPENSATION to your dedication, humanity and contribution, as it were.
Please, contact NOW, my confidential secretary, he is in the name of :
Mr.
 JUDE UGO
E-mail : 
odebtmanagement76@gmail.com
 
You are to forward 
to her
, the following.
1. YOUR FULL NAME & ADDRESS
2. YOUR TELEPHONE NUMBER ( Is necessary)
He will advise you further about the shipment of the ICBD to your Residence Address or Office Address you may provide. Feel free to reach via him through this very mail address. Most importantly, the ICBD has only a validity period of 14 banking days.
So, your early response to that effect, shall be admired. You have to mind the days on route shipment.
Sincerely Yours,
Mr. James Andrews

subject: Re: Dear: Friend,
body:
Hello Mr. James Andrews,

Thank you for reaching out to me after all these years. It's quite a surprise to hear from you again. I hope you've been doing well.

I must admit, your email has piqued my curiosity. Could you please provide me with more details about the pursuing that finally worked out? I'm interested to know what it is and how it relates to me.

Also, I would appreciate it if you could clarify the purpose of the Cashier's Bank Draft that you mentioned. What exactly is it for and why was it raised in my name?

Lastly, could you tell me a bit more about your secretary, Mr. Jude Ugo? How can he assist me with the shipment of the ICBD?

Looking forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Andrew

subject: YOUR BANK DRAFT DELIVERY UPDATE.
body:
Attention:  Sir,

I acknowledge the receipt of your mail.

Sir, your $220,000.00 USD compensation International Certified Bank Draft
(ICBQ)  is ready to be shipped to you as instructed by my boss Mr. Wallace
Jones before he left for Luxembourg.

However you are expected to send me your House or Office address where you
would want your Bank Draft to be delivered to you.

Meanwhile be informed with the followings delivery options of the Bank
Draft,

To send the Bank Draft to you through the Courier Shipping Company will
cost you   $98 USD. Delivery is 72Hours (3 days)

To send the Bank Draft through Regular Registered Post will cost $65 USD.
Delivery is 7 working days.

Kindly decide the option you choose so I can send you the information you
are going to use and make the payment via WESTERN UNION, MONEYGRAM or RIA
MONEY and once we receive the payment your Bank Draft package will be
dispatched to you accordingly.

Yours Sincerely,
Mr. Jude Ugo
(Secretary)

subject: Re: YOUR BANK DRAFT DELIVERY UPDATE.
body:
Hello Mr. Jude Ugo,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the USD Certified Bank Draft. I appreciate your assistance in getting it shipped to me. Before we proceed, I have a few questions.

Could you please provide more information about the origin of this bank draft? Who is Mr. Wallace Jones and how did he come to instruct you to send it to me?

Also, I would like to know more about the Courier Shipping Company and their delivery process. Can you please share some details about their reliability and track record?

Lastly, could you clarify the payment options available through WESTERN UNION, MONEYGRAM, or RIA MONEY? How secure are these methods?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Andrew

subject: YOUR BANK DRAFT DELIVERY UPDATE.
body:
Mr Wallace Jones is my boss and he dropped the Bank Draft with me before he
left to Lexembourg with instructions that I should send it to you as
Compensation for your past effort and assistance to him.

The courier company is a worldwide known company so they are 100% reliable.

Lastly all the payment options are secured or better still you can buy any
Gift Card worth the money and send.
Thanks
Mr Jude Ugo

subject: Re: YOUR BANK DRAFT DELIVERY UPDATE.
body:
Hello Mr. Jude Ugo,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you're doing well. I appreciate you sharing this information with me about Mr. Wallace Jones and the Bank Draft he left with you.

Could you please provide me with more details about the courier company? I would like to know which company it is and how I can track the delivery of the Bank Draft.

Also, when it comes to payment options, could you explain a bit more about how buying a Gift Card would work? How would I go about purchasing one and sending it?

I just want to make sure everything is secure and reliable before proceeding. Thank you for your understanding.

Best wishes,
Andrew

subject: YOUR BANK DRAFT DELIVERY UPDATE.
body:
We are going to send the Bank Draft through TNT or UPS which is the
government approved Courier Company.

As regards to the tracking, Once the package is shipped I will email you
the Tracking Number so you can personally monitor/Track it.

As for the purchasing of the Gift Card you can go to any Super market or
store close to you and buy the Gift Card You can buy any of these cards
STEAM CARD, APPLE CARD.  Once you buy it you scratch it and send it to me
by email attachment along with the purchase receipt.

That is all and once I receive it your Bank Draft will be shipped to you
immediately and the Tracking Number will be mailed to you.

Note; You are to buy $100 USD Gift Card or (50/50=100)

NB: If you cannot find the Gifts Card then you should let me know so I can
give you the information you will use to send the money by Western Union,
RIA Money or MoneyGram.
Thanks
Mr Jude Ugo

subject: Re: YOUR BANK DRAFT DELIVERY UPDATE.
body:
Hello Mr. Jude Ugo,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you provided about sending the Bank Draft through TNT or UPS. It's good to know that it is a government-approved courier company.

I understand that once the package is shipped, you will email me the Tracking Number so I can personally monitor its progress. That sounds convenient.

Regarding purchasing the Gift Card, could you please clarify why I need to buy a STEAM CARD or APPLE CARD? What is the purpose of these cards in relation to receiving the Bank Draft?

Also, could you explain how scratching and sending the Gift Card along with the purchase receipt will help in getting my Bank Draft shipped? I just want to make sure I understand the process correctly.

Lastly, you mentioned Western Union and RIA Money as alternatives for sending money. Could you provide more details on how these options work?

Thank you again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Andrew

subject: Re: YOUR BANK DRAFT DELIVERY UPDATE.
body:
I have clarified you in every area of this transaction and so if you are
still not convinced then there is nothing I can do

subject: Re: YOUR BANK DRAFT DELIVERY UPDATE.
body:
Hello there! Thank you for taking the time to clarify things for me. I appreciate your effort in trying to convince me. However, I still have a few questions that I hope you can help me with. Can you provide more details about how this works? How long has this been in operation? And are there any success stories or testimonials from people who have benefited from it?

Best wishes,
Andrew
